content: To be clear, if you defeat him on your first encounter with him, you won't be able to collect his spirit until you've got the Gourd further on in the chapter. But if you don't defeat him before ringing the bells and unlocking the secret area in Chapter 1, you'll miss him entirely!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight - Missable Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
To be clear, if you defeat him on your first encounter with him, you won't be able to collect his spirit until you've got the Gourd further on in the chapter. But if you don't defeat him before ringing the bells and unlocking the secret area in Chapter 1, you'll miss him entirely!
